product_name: Burley Honey Bee Bike Trailer with Stroller Kit - Double
long_description: With room to seat 2 kids, the Burley Honey Bee Bike Trailer includes a stroller kit so you can tow it to your destination, detach it from your bike, then flip down the stroller wheel and stroll away! Includes an easy-to-use bike tow bar, which enables you to pull the Burley Honey Bee by bike; hitch positioning is designed for superior trailer tracking. Included Stroller Kit features a single, easy-tracking front wheel for easy strolling and walking; wheel can be folded up out of the way for use with bike tow bar. The Burley Honey Bee Bike Trailer is decked out with fresh updates including an easy-to-latch folding system, a strong parking brake and a 2-in-1 non-zip weather cover. Height-adjustable handlebar doubles as a roll bar; rear tailgate offers easy access to rear cargo. Comfy suspended seat is built with breathable flow-through mesh and a helmet pocket; 5-point harness system with padded shoulder straps keeps children comfortable and secure. 20 in. alloy wheels with wheel guards roll easily and can be removed with a simple push of a button. Reflectors, reflective trim and safety flag provide low-light visibility; tinted windows have UV protection. Folds quickly and compactly for easy storage; folded dimensions are 37 x 24.5 x 11. The Burley Honey Bee Bike Trailer with Stroller Kit includes bike tow bar and hitch, stroller kit, safety flag and manual.
